title: BOTs ARE BACK IN FASHION AGAIN in ARAM Riot
body:
Pleeeease, actually do something :(
- We have to wait during champion select, why not introduce a simple capture code, we've got to do it on every web site we go to, nothing new here.
- How about in the 1st 60 seconds of the game players can initiate a vote to replace a player with the next in line, if it gets majority the game pauses and pulls in another person, repeat until no bots. To stop uncalled for boots, have the voted champ enter a capture code to stay in the game.

If you need some help in detecting them:
1. Bots don't have masteries
2. Bots play ARAM
3. Bots will instantly buy items and run to the outer turret
4. Bots will have a very high death count

Played several games over the last week with bots, one ARAM game was basically a 2v2 game as there were 3 bots on each team. At least it was more even that way lol. I remember last time I posted about this I played a 1 v 5 ARAM game, I think it would be more fun playing the practice tool...

Time to start taking this seriously Riot, please.

replies.body:
What pisses me off even more is Riot won't even reply to threads like these letting the players know that they are even aware of the issue and are doing something to fix it.

I say compensation for time lost, I wouldn't care if it was one game in one hundred that had a bot but it is every fucking game, so Riot FIX YOUR SHIT!!!!!!!!!

There are bots that have masteries and don't automatically leave the fountain. Most bots tend to have either the Tibbers teddy form summoners icon (the ones without masteries) or the thorny rose summoner icon (the ones with masteries).

Just some other ways to tell if ya gots a bot

As I type my game is loading with 2 bots on each team, last night a game against 4 bots, it's out of control.

I'm reporting every single one, I know some others do too.. Do something please.

True, there's no immediate money in them trying to fix this, but players might have enough of it and stop playing (before their addiction kicks in and they have to start playing again).

Also with the new masteries it's harder to tell if they're a bot.

I just wish they'd make a 5 champ bot team and go for bot matches, then no one would know, they'd level up for free, and won't ruin the game for the rest of us.

Actually 3's not always right.  Some of the bot programs will sit there for 30-40 seconds then buy a renewable potion, an oracles elixir and I think it's boots.  They'll also run through the healths on the way to "the fight" from the base even though they just spawned on full health.  Aside from that their combat-bot is about the same.
This has become more and more true the last few months.

Don't fret I am sure Riot is dishing them out chat restrictions lol

Your right though they are becoming a hazard, the number of games without a Bot is now uncommon.

Riot won't do anything, to be honest I have a feeling they have no idea how to even fix the problem it's been going on for years and don't even care as long as people are silly enough to keep spending money.

Bots don't swear
so riot don't care

They also artificially inflate population statistics whis is good for riot who are shedding players at an alarming rate.
